title: Lidl begins hiring for 800 jobs at first 13 stores in N.C.
text: Lidl begins hiring for 800 jobs at first 13 stores in N.C. Feb 23, 2017, 1:58pm EST Industries & Tags Amanda Hoyle Staff Writer Triangle Business Journal Share Amanda Hoyle Staff Writer Triangle Business Journal Home of the Day Lidl US in February 2017 began hiring to fill 800 store associate positions for its first… more David Keith c/o Lidl US Thirteen cities and towns across North Carolina will be among the first to test out the new stores that the European grocer Lidl plans to begin introducing to the eastern U.S. in summer 2017 . The specialty discount grocery chain announced Thursday it has officially begun hiring for about 800 store positions across the state with plans to have all of the job positions filled within the next four months. The North Carolina jobs are among 4,000 new associate positions the company plans to create by summer 2018. Lidl US in February 2017 began hiring to fill 800 store associate positions for its first… more David Keith c/o Lidl US Lidl also has about seven job positions for which it is hiring at its distribution facility in Mebane, according to its jobs site . To date, Lidl executives have been silent about specific locations where its first stores will be located. Though Triangle Business Journal has documented land sales and construction permits for many of these first Lidl locations , the company had not yet confirmed any of them. But on Thursday, Lidl US spokesman Will Hargrove confirmed that the company will open at least one store each in these 13 North Carolina municipalities by summer. Charlotte
